Q_DESC:
The teacher selected 4 students from a class to play a game. Students were asked to wear a  t-shirt from 4 t-shirts among which one is Red, one is blue and two of them are yellow. 

Then the teacher  took a chalk piece and marked 4 points 1,2,3 & 4. Point 1 has a connecter to 2 and 4(ie. 1,2 & 4 are adjacent). Point 2 has a connector to 1, 3 and 4.

She asked them to stand on the points 1,2,3 & 4 such that no two adjacent students wear the  same color t-shirt.
